com.radiotelescope.controller

Class BaseRestController

  • com.radiotelescope.controller.BaseRestController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminLogErrorListController, AdminLogListController, AdminRetrieveUserRoleController, AdminUnapprovedUserRoleListController, AdminUserBanController, AdminUserListController, AdminUserRoleValidateController, AdminUserUnbanController, AppointmentCancelController, AppointmentCompletedUserListController, AppointmentCreateController, AppointmentDataViewController, AppointmentFutureTelescopeListController, AppointmentListBetweenDates, AppointmentListFutureAppointmentsByUserController, AppointmentMakePublicController, AppointmentPublicCompletedController, AppointmentRetrieveController, AppointmentUpdateController, AuthAdminController, AuthUserController, UserActivateAccountController, UserChangePasswordController, UserDeleteController, UserLoginController, UserRegisterController, UserRequestEmailUpdateTokenController, UserResetPasswordController, UserResetPasswordRequestController, UserRetrieveController, UserUpdateController, UserUpdateEmailController

    public class BaseRestController

    Abstract class that all REST controllers will extend that takes a class Logger as a parameter so we can handle logging successes and errors. It also has a class Result object that is used to return information to the client

    See Also:
    class Logger, class Result
